name: SKTestTransaction
desc: A transaction that occurs in the testing environment.

items.name: var identifier: Int
items.desc: The identifier of the transaction in the test environment.

items.name: var originalTransactionIdentifier: Int
items.desc: The identifier of the original transaction.

items.name: var productIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier that uniquely represents a product, which you provide in the StoreKit configuration file.

items.name: var state: SKPaymentTransactionState
items.desc: The state of the transaction in the test environment.

items.name: var purchaseDate: Date
items.desc: The date of purchase for the transaction.

items.name: var cancelDate: Date?
items.desc: The date on which the user canceled a subscription, or upgraded a subscription.

items.name: var autoRenewingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether automatic renewal is enabled for the subscription.

items.name: var hasPurchaseIssue: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you resolve this transaction using the test framework functions.

items.name: var isPendingPriceIncreaseConsent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the subscription has a price increase that is awaiting consent from the user.

items.name: var pendingAskToBuyConfirmation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transaction is awaiting an Ask to Buy confirmation.
